comments.text:
This video shows an example of a Youtuber talking about a controversial video that another Youtuber made and viewers of this video would go to that video, see an ad, and give the other Youtuber money. And this video shows a Youtuber talking about how Youtubers get other Youtubers to watch controversial videos. However, this video can also be controversial because he is trying to clickbait people into watching this video. Then, other Youtubers would talk about this controversial video.
